comment.author: 46696233@N00
comment._content: www.nycgovparks.org/sub_about/parks_history/historic_tour... 1902 ... in De Witt Clinton Park the first "Children's Farm Garden" was established. One of the first Parks Department recreation programs, Children's Farm Gardens, allowed children to garden in small plots of land in parks.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Kick-off day for the program in 1911: May 20.
